title: Taking Care of an Elder at Home
coverImageAlt: Caregiver helping an elder at home
description:
Caring for an elder at home is an act of love.

It means helping them feel safe and respected every day.

Elders may feel weak or tired. They need patience, kindness, and time.

Small help, done daily, can make a big difference.
closingLine: Your care helps elders live with dignity.
